name: TC-24-P :: Write a Review for a Product

actions.action: Navigate to a specific product detail page.
actions.expectedResult: The product detail page is displayed correctly.

actions.action: Select the product's size and color.
Click the "Be the first to write your review" link.
actions.expectedResult: A form for writing a review appears.

actions.action: Enter a review title in the "Title" field.
Enter the review content in the "Review" field.
actions.expectedResult: The review content is entered successfully.
A success message "Your comment has been submitted" is displayed.
